page.title: 09INDUSTRIES-FORRES EAST
page.content:
There are not many industries in the East of Forres. There are no manufacturers at all in this area. However, there is a lot of Horticulture (fields, crops, ploughed land). There is a quarry where they dig up stones from the ground for building roads.
There is a service station which sells fuel for cars and lorries and they also have a car-wash, and a little shop that sells confectionery. The Garden Centre occupies a large area of land at Bogton. They sell seeds, house-plants and trees. It has a large tree display and attractive surroundings.
There is also a sewage works in the area which copes with all the waste from Forres and surrounding area.
